about_the_game: For those who want to experience King of Volleyball in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.

content_descriptors.notes: King of Volleyball has romantic relationships between women. The protagonist is a therapist and a lot of issues of same-gender relationships are deeply discussed. Protagonist and other characters frequently consume alcohol. Some mild sexual references are also used. All characters are over 18 years of age. There is nudity and nude kissing present in the game.

detailed_description: For those who want to experience King of Volleyball in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and above
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: King of Volleyball Adults Only 18+ Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
